text:
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
UNIVERSITY PARK
LOS ANGELES 7
May 25, 1959
Dr. Harry Skoroia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
III Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Hariy,
Congratulations on receiving funds of Ford and the National Defense
Education Act.
Thanks, too, for your note of May 18. T am awaiting Bill Harley*s
word on any correction of the times that you listed for board meetings
of October 25 and 26.
I am busy soliciting the indicated stations to become members of
the network, and I hope that we ourselves will be able to join soon.
Cordially,
khjrak
air mail
Kenneth Harwood, Chairman
Department of Telecommunications
